rules_text: When this creature enters, create a implant token with a deathtouch counter. [i](It’s a token artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery”)[/i]
notes:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/36YZm

OG_7:
Created two implants

OG_6:
When MV4 Basilisker enters, put a deathtouch counter on each of up to two artifacts you control.

OG_5: Previous version was Venominchworm
Costed 2G
When MV3 Venominchworm 99? enters the battlefield, create an implant token with a deathtouch counter on it.
2/3


Redbay’s Feedback:
I think this one hits what you desired from the cycle the best. The body is good with a deathtouch counter, and then you can put a deathtouch counter on their best creature and you now have a deathtouch body that can eat their best creature.
